author: Staff Reporter
text:
Eight Maoists surrender in Narayanpur district

A woman Maoist commander was killed and eight others surrendered before the police in different parts of the Bastar region in Chhattisgarh on Tuesday.

A police statement said an encounter took place between the police and the Maoists near the Bayanar forest of Bijapur on Tuesday. A woman Maoist commander was killed and one 12-bore rifle, one locally made gun and a heavy Maoist dump were found. An official said the number of casualties could be more on the Maoists side as they could be seen dragging bodies inside the forest.

In another development, eight Maoists, including two women, surrendered before the police in Narayanpur.
title: Woman Maoist commander killed in Bastar
